issue.title: [Rust] Remove SIMD specific benchmark code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8723](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8723). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that SIMD is behind a feature flag it's trivial to compare SIMD vs non-SIMD and the SIMD versions of benchmarks can be removed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8723?focusedCommentId=17127272) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7359
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7359>
